00421 inline uint32 
00422 RouteReplyPacket::getNbrItems() const
00423 {
00424    return readShort(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE);
00425 }
00426 
00427 inline void 
00428 RouteReplyPacket::resetNbrItems() 
00429 {
00430    writeShort(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE, 0);
00431 }
00432 
00433 inline bool 
00434 RouteReplyPacket::getStartDir() 
00435 {
00436    byte b = readByte(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 2);
00437    if ( (b & 0x80) == 0x80) {
00438       // The first bit is set
00439       return (true);
00440    } else {
00441       return (false);
00442    }
00443 }
00444 
00445 inline void 
00446 RouteReplyPacket::setStartDir(bool towards0) 
00447 {
00448    byte b = readByte(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+2);
00449    if (towards0) {
00450       b |= 0x80;
00451    } else {
00452       b &= 0x7f;
00453    }
00454    writeByte(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+2, b);
00455 }
00456 
00457 inline bool 
00458 RouteReplyPacket::getEndDir() 
00459 {
00460    byte b = readByte(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 2);
00461    if ( (b & 0x40) == 0x40) {
00462       // The first bit is set
00463       return (true);
00464    } else {
00465       return (false);
00466    }
00467 }
00468 
00469 inline void 
00470 RouteReplyPacket::setEndDir(bool towards0) 
00471 {
00472    byte b = readByte(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+2);
00473    if (towards0) {
00474       b |= 0x40;
00475    } else {
00476       b &= 0xbf;
00477    }
00478    writeByte(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+2, b);
00479 }
00480 
00481 inline void 
00482 RouteReplyPacket::setRouteType(byte routeType) 
00483 {
00484    writeByte(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 3, routeType);
00485 }
00486 
00487 inline byte 
00488 RouteReplyPacket::getRouteType(void)  const
00489 {
00490    return readByte(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 3);
00491 }
00492 
00493 inline void 
00494 RouteReplyPacket::incNbrItems()
00495 {
00496    writeShort(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE, getNbrItems()+1);
00497 }
